title: Total softwood and hardwood , production in Canada 2017
summary: softwood hardwood was highest in March , producing approximately 5350000 m^3 continuing with high hardwood through April and May .
hardwood falls through the summer months and after an increase in October drops to its lowest value of approximately 3900000 m^3 in December .
gold: The total softwood and hardwood production in Canada showed an oscillating trend over 2017 . In particular , couple of peaks have been registered , mainly during the months of March and May . At the same time , the production value showed its minimum values during the months of July and December .
